bibl.title: The Roman Castrum of Tell Abu Sayfi at Qantara. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: In 1994 a mission of the SCA rediscovered near Qantara the Diocletianic fortress of Abu Sayfi (ancient Sile) and succeeded in cleaning its walls to their full extent.
bibl.seg: ABD EL-MAQSOUD Mohamed, Mohamed KAMAL IBRAHIM, Ramadan HELMY MOHAMED and Peter GROSSMANN, The Roman Castrum of Tell Abu Sayfi at Qantara. Avec résumé en anglais.
In 1994 a mission of the SCA rediscovered near Qantara the Diocletianic fortress of Abu Sayfi (ancient Sile) and succeeded in cleaning its walls to their full extent.
Abd El-Maqsoud Kamal Ibrahim Helmy Mohamed Grossmann
